ratings-starsratings-desc: {{doc-singularthey}} Used as description for two parser function #starrating (and #allrating).
ratings-par-page: Used as description for the parameter "page".
ratings-par-tag: Used as description for the parameter "tag".
ratings-par-showdisabled: Used as description for the parameter "showdisabled".
ratings-par-incsummary:
*Rating element is the thing which is being rated (for instance a page).
*Rating is a vote/score given by the user about a property, not a categorization.
ratings-votesummary-desc: Used as description for two parser function #votesummary
ratings-current-score: Used as rating summary message. Parameters: * $1 - average of user rating * $2 - number of ratings If $2 is 0, the following message is used: * {{msg-mw|ratings-no-votes-yet}}
